content.prompt:
Figure 1 shows the general structure of an amino acid.

 

Figure 1. Structure of an amino acid

 

Which of the following amino acid components shown in Figure 1 best determines the interaction between an embedded protein and the hydrophobic regions of the cell membrane?

choices.label: The hydrogen atom bonded to the central carbon
The carboxyl group bonded to the central carbon
The R group bonded to the central carbon
The amine group bonded to the central carbon

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
